name: 103_jgcramer_absorber
description: Absorber: weak sensor-motor drive (0.2-0.3) with near-maximal self-feedback (w33=0.9, w44=-0.9). The absorber in Wheeler-Feynman electrodynamics — the response of the universe that completes the transaction. Each motor absorbs its own signal, creating internal oscillation from minimal external input.
